{{Description|One glorious moment on-stage, a decade of preparation behind it.}}
'''Opening Flourish''' is [[Yun Jin]]'s [[Elemental Skill]].

==Gameplay Notes==
*This skill generates '''2''' [[Elemental Particle]]s when pressed, '''2.5''' at Charge Level 1, and '''3''' at Charge Level 2, if it hits at least 1 target.
*The button can be released before the final animation plays automatically, while retaining the effects of Charge Level 2.
*{{TalentNote|character=Yun Jin|talent=Opening Flourish|ascension|1|True to Oneself}}

;<big>Constellation Effects</big>
*{{TalentNote|constellation|1|Thespian Gallop}}
*{{TalentNote|constellation|5|Famed Throughout the Land}}
